DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Face Paint Refills - Orange (2 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Classic Orange Face Paint applies smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo Pastel Face Paints are Snazaroo's softer colored face paints.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
Snazaroo Orange Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage and comes in a 0.07 ounces (2 ml) refill size container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.07 ounces (2 ml) Snazaroo Orange Face Paint refill container is good for 5 full faces or 100 to 150 cheek art designs (approx 2in x 2in size)
Refills work in the round Snazaroo 18 color wheel
One of the most popular face paints in the world
Comes in a 0.07 ounces (2 ml) refill size container
